energy quenching centers, such as typical lattice/surface
defects and impurities introduced by higher 60% Cr

For lighting phosphors, the working temperature would be
much higher than room temperature. Although pc-LEDs are
signiﬁcantly more energy eﬃcient light source than incandes-

LED still becomes heat rather than light, and in high power
packages in a more conﬁned space, this can lead to an
which eﬃciently quenches photoluminescence via fast NR of
excited electrons to the ground state of activators.

fast NR process to populate the lowest energy point of the
yielding far-red photons at room/lower temperature. However,
in the case of an elevated temperature, the absorbed energy in
(4F) excited state is feasibly promoted to the intersystem
thermal activation (T-activation) and then is quenched by fast
